name: webgpu-torch
description: Tensor computation and autograd with WebGPU acceleration

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && rm -rf web/dist && ts-node ./scripts/codegen.ts && ts-node ./scripts/plotgen.ts && tsc && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode production && cp -a dist ./web/ && cp package.json README.md LICENSE ./dist/ && npx typedoc --out web/docs src/index.ts
scripts.build-onnx: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o src/onnx.js external/onnx.proto && pbts -o src/onnx.d.ts src/onnx.js

author: Frank A. Krueger
